name: Amour in the Abbey
description:
This is a romantic visual novel about lesbian nuns. ♡( ◡‿◡ )

The game is inspired by nuns in the Catholic church during in the Medieval period. 

The game is made by Morgis and DValkyrie for the jam Medieval but Queer.

-----------------------------------------------------

Credits: 

Scripting and art are made by Morgis

Music and SFX  are made by DValkyrie

Some voice sounds are made by Milmino

The first background image of a church/abbey is made by Paul Franz Otto in 1899.

One background of a hallway is taken from Unsplashed, the rest of the background images are made with Midjourney AI and  Dall-E 2.

(Some SFX are taken from freesound.org and a few are made by Morgis)
